nodes.text: Star Wars: Blood Ties Volume 2—Boba Fett is Dead
Star Wars: Blood Ties Volume 2—Boba Fett is Dead is a collection of the Star Wars: Blood Ties: Boba Fett is Dead series released on January 29, 2013.

The news spreads from one end of the galaxy to the other like wildfire: Boba Fett, the galaxy's most feared bounty hunter, is dead! But members of the team that killed Fett are themselves being picked off, one by one, by a mysterious avenger, and Connor Freeman - the son of one of Jango Fett's clones - gets drawn into the whodunit. Freeman is recruited against his will to find and safeguard a particular bounty hunter on a distant world with an unknown connection to Boba Fett...
